content: Praise and Supplication to God for Victory.
A Song. A Psalm of David.
I will sing, I will sing praises, even with my soul.
I will praise  give thanks to You, O , among the people;
And I will sing praises to You among the nations.
For Your lovingkindness is great  higher than the heavens;
Be exalted [in majesty], O God, above the heavens,
And Your glory above all the earth.
That Your beloved [ones] may be rescued,
Save with Your right hand, and answer me!
